summary: A card sharp gets caught cheating and winds up in a brawl. He is unjustly jailed for the death of a mob boss; and when he is released, he searches frantically for his wife and son, whom he has never seen.
cast: Andy Lau|Athena Chu|Nick Cheung|Waise Lee|Jack Kao|Angie Cheung|Bonnie Law|Emotion Cheung|Ka-Wing Man|Ben Ng|Frankie Chi-Hung Ng|Chi Yeung Wong|Spencer Lam|Jing Wong|Siu-Kei Lee|Kin-Wai Yeung|Kam Tong Wong|Aman Chang|Tsan-Sang Cheung|Gary Wing-Lun Mak|Cheung Wai|Wai Yin Tse|Mei-Shing Chow|Mo-Chan Chik|Tin-Bo Tam|Man-Chun Wong
title: Du xia 1999
